item.title: CVE-2024-29078|2024-05-27T23:52:11.993Z -- esmind%2C%20llc -- mosp%20kintai%20kanri
item.description: Incorrect permission assignment for critical resource issue exists in MosP kintai kanri V4.6.6 and earlier, which may allow a remote unauthenticated attacker with access to the product to alter the product settings.
